PHRASE.LANG:
It's the Codeglue Clothes Special Bundle (Women)! This bundle includes Red Glitter Dress (Women), Black Glitter Dress (Women), Pink Glitter Dress (Women), Little Red Dress (Women), Red Salsa Dress (Women), Black Salsa Dress (Women) and Pink Salsa Dress (Women).

 **IMPORTANT NOTICE**
 This "Codeglue Clothes Special Bundle (Women)" may contain the items you have already purchased. Only the item which is not yet purchased is added to your wardrobe and same purchased item will not appear in the wardrobe twice. Purchased Special Bundles are not refundable, transferable or exchangeable, and cannot be redeemed for cash or credit. [#Legal]

Codeglue 의상 특별 번들 (여성)입니다! 반짝이는 적색 드레스 (여성), 반짝이는 흑색 드레스 (여성), 반짝이는 분홍색 드레스 (여성), 작은 적색 드레스 (여성), 적색 살사 드레스 (여성), 흑색 살사 드레스 (여성)과 분홍색 살사 드레스 (여성)를 포함합니다.

**주의 사항**
 해당 "Codeglue 의상 특별 번들 (여성)"에 포함되어 있는 아이템 중에는 플레이어가 이미 구입한 것이 있을 수 있습니다. 현재 미구매 상태인 아이템들만이 플레이어의 인벤토리에 추가되며, 이미 보유한 아이템의 수량은 추가되지 않습니다.구입이 끝난 번들 상품은 환불, 교환, 양도가 불가하며 현금으로 전환될 수 없습니다. [#Legal]

It's the Codeglue Clothes Special Bundle (Women)! This bundle includes Red Glitter Dress (Women), Black Glitter Dress (Women), Pink Glitter Dress (Women), Little Red Dress (Women), Red Salsa Dress (Women), Black Salsa Dress (Women) and Pink Salsa Dress (Women).

 **IMPORTANT NOTICE**
 This "Codeglue Clothes Special Bundle (Women)" may contain the items you have already purchased. Only the item which is not yet purchased is added to your wardrobe and same purchased item will not appear in the wardrobe twice. Purchased Special Bundles are not refundable, transferable or exchangeable, and cannot be redeemed for cash or credit. [#Legal]

這是Codeglue服裝優惠組合包(女用)。本組合包包括閃爍紅色裙(女用)、閃爍黑色裙(女用)、閃爍粉紅色裙(女用)、小紅裙(女用)、紅色騷莎舞裙(女用)、黑色騷莎舞裙(女用)及粉紅色騷莎舞裙(女用)。

 **重要事項**
本Codeglue服裝優惠組合包(女用)可能內含您已購買的道具。只有您之前未有購入的道具會追加至您的衣帽間內，已購入的道具則不會重複顯示。組合包一經購買，即不可退款、轉讓或交換，亦不能兌換現金或電子錢。 [#Legal]
